localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Firecrown allows app developers to build Flutter widgets visually. Our code generator provides clean and maintainable Flutter code, which can easily be customized and integrated in your IDE.
nodes.title: Firecrown - Build customized Flutter widgets visually
nodes.author: Lucas Josefiak

nodes.excerpt: Sonar.Network provides automatic daily website analysis. Analysis of more than 50 SEO errors, checking all website pages for CSS, JS, HTML validation. Payment for each site separately, the limit of 50,000 pages per site, daily checks, notifications.
nodes.title: Sonar Network - Automatic daily website analysis
nodes.author: Artur Noimann

nodes.excerpt: Use your web apps as true apps with Firework! ğŸš€ Turn your everyday websites into desktop apps ğŸ•¹ Keep them on hand on the Taskbar or Dock ğŸ The apps launch instantly and are immediately ready to use ğŸ­ Switch between your web apps using familiar methods
nodes.title: Firework 2 - Easy access to web sites and applications

nodes.excerpt: Shar.ec is designed to let you share end-to-end encrypted screen recordings easily.
nodes.title: Shar.ec - Share end-to-end encrypted screen recordings
nodes.author: Fredrik Jonsson

nodes.excerpt: Collect your avatar from different parts. The code of this program is very easy, any developer will be able to understand the code. SVG is used to draw an avatar. Demo version of the project: https://avatar-maker-vue.netlify.app/
nodes.title: Avatar Maker - Create your own avatar
nodes.author: David Voskanyan

nodes.excerpt: Create simple shareable polls in seconds. Share your polls across all of your channels - newsletter, group text, Twitter, etc. No sign up required.
nodes.title: minipoll - Create simple shareable polls in seconds

nodes.excerpt: Generate blob shapes: - Set Solid color - Set Gradient colors - Set a pattern background - Custom image clipping - Save and manage blobs locally - Sharable URL - Dark mode - Works offline and PWA support - Faster initial load and better performance - Blob change sound
nodes.title: Blobs 2.0 - Generate beautiful blobs for your design

nodes.excerpt: The Awesome lists on GitHub are great, but it's hard to know which projects are actively maintained and sift through them all easily. I built this tool to help me visualize and query all of the cool resources people put together.
nodes.title: Awesome Viewer - Visualize all of Github's awesome lists

nodes.excerpt: The simplest and most modern data-scraper as a service, as if postman was automated! Focus on developing data-dependant apps without worrying about the data gathering infrastructure. Made for aggregators, bots and data-driven applications.
nodes.title: Nozomi - Postman, but automated
nodes.author: Nicholas Chen

nodes.excerpt: Snap viewers out their doom scrolling with lively animated icons. With 3000+ easy-to-use graphics, you can build consistent apps, stores, and brands without the extra time or expense. - 20 popular styles - Tagged and searchable platform - Multiple formats
nodes.title: Animated Icons 3 - 3000+ engaging motion graphics by Icons8

nodes.title: WeWeb - No-code site builder that integrates with the tools you love

nodes.title: Prefix - Build custom computer automations anywhere

nodes.excerpt: Virtual workplace for remote & distributed teams â€” Team Presence, Fast Video Communication, Collaboration, Live Discussion & more.
nodes.title: WTEAM - All-in-one virtual office for remote & distributed teams

nodes.excerpt: Canâ€™t remember where you saved your Bank Account Number? Need quick access to your CV or the digital copy of your Passport? Thatâ€™s why we created Clipboard PRO: the easiest way to find, copy and paste all your information with a tap!
nodes.title: Clipboard PRO - Fast access to all your most used content
nodes.author: Giuseppe Travasoni

nodes.excerpt: Daily makes it easy to build real-time audio apps. We're a developer platform for audio and video APIs. Check out our Starter Kit with sample code for React, Android, ReactNative, and iOS. You can build audio fast, and scale with our secure infrastructure.
nodes.title: Daily - Build audio apps in a weekend
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: A web-based design tool to generate unique SVG design assets for websites, social media, blog posts, pitch decks, and more! Choose a visual from our growing list of generators, customize, randomize, and export it as an SVG or a PNG.
nodes.title: Haikei - Generate unique SVG design assets in just a few seconds
nodes.author: Cristina Poiata

nodes.excerpt: Emoji cloud is a CDN for vector emojies. Search copy and paste vector emojies to your projects in seconds
nodes.title: Emoji Cloud - A CDN for SVG emoji's
nodes.author: Alohe

nodes.excerpt: FlashDrive NoOps app platform handles everything for you while you focus on your product. Made by developers for developers, FlashDrive is compatible with Git deployment (Github, Gitlabs etc...), DockerHub etc... Free backups, SSL certs. and load balancers.
nodes.title: FlashDrive.io - noOps app platform for your apps
nodes.author: Alexandre Gonzales

nodes.excerpt: A simple service to get cute dogs as placeholders for your websites and designs. Just add a width and height to the end of the url.
nodes.title: Place Dog - Cute dogs as placeholders for your websites and designs
nodes.author: Josh Ghent

nodes.excerpt: A simple and elegant desktop application for managing your Laravel applications. - Execute Artisan commands easily in a nice interface. - Tinker with your project in a magical code editor.
nodes.title: Laravel Kit - Desktop Laravel admin panel app with no configuration needs

nodes.excerpt: Coder moves software development to your cloud, centralizing an organization's development initiatives and unlocking substantial gains in both developer velocity and enterprise security.
nodes.title: Coder - The developer workspace platform
nodes.author: Nicolas Beauvais

nodes.excerpt: The project aims to provide tools to use during the development process. Generate Lorem Ipsum placeholder texts, custom color dummy images, and videos of different sizes. Use generated content to test the layout until the real content arrives. Give it a try!
nodes.title: ipsm.io - Collection of productivity tools for developers & designers
nodes.author: Arsen Pyuskyulyan
